name: 7th International Conference on Computer and Communication Technology
content: The 7th ICCCT-17 is a major multidisciplinary conference organized with the objective of bringing together researchers, developers and practitioners from academia and industry working in all areas of computer and communication technology. Accepted and presented papers will be published in the conference proceedings and in ACM digital library.
organizers: Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology Allahabad
